basic_info.description_header: Hello! I'm Christian Kenney, a passionate software developer with a strong foundation in Java, Angular, React, and building applications that handle large amounts of data. With over 4 years of professional experience, I have had the opportunity to work on diverse projects, including government contracts, which has allowed me to expand my knowledge in the field of software development.
basic_info.description: I hold a bachelor's degree from the University of Texas at San Antonio and am currently enrolled in a master's program for software development at Maryville University. Below, you will find detailed information about my previous experience, academic journey, skills, and latest projects. Below my photo, you will find links to my LinkedIn profile, GitHub, and my resume. Please feel free to reach out to me with any opportunities, freelance inquiries, or if you have any comments or questions!

projects.title: Meal Planning App
projects.description: I created this meal planning app using Ionic for my mobile development app. With a combination of Angular on the front end that is dynamic to fit any device.

projects.title: Hodgepodgees
projects.description: Floral Bouquet website designed for a client using Squarespace.

projects.title: A24 Film Challenge
projects.description: I created an app to randomly generate a movie challenge based on certain criteria. All films are related to A24
